entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding world. (Excerpt: 'THE MINISTRY OF MAGIC')

entities.name: weasley family
entities.description: A family of wizards. (Excerpt: 'A photograph of the Weasley family stood beside the in-t ray.')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. (Excerpt: 'Harry noticed that Percy appeared to have walked out of it.')

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: A member of the Weasley family. (Excerpt: 'Percy appeared to have walked out of it.')

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: The father of Percy and a member of the Weasley family. (Excerpt: '“We haven’t got a window,” said Mr. Weasley apologetically...')

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: A person who gave Mr. Weasley a sheaf of parchment. (Excerpt: 'Harry squeezed himself into the chair behind Perkins’s desk while Mr. Weasley rifled through the sheaf of parchment Kingsley Shacklebolt had given him.')

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who is mentioned as being amused by something. (Excerpt: '“Yes, he’s right, I’m sure Sirius will find that very amusing — oh dear...')

entities.name: perkins
entities.description: A person whose desk Harry sat behind. (Excerpt: 'Have a seat, Harry, doesn’t look as if Perkins is in yet.')

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley received a sheaf of parchment from Kingsley Shacklebolt. (Excerpt: 'Harry squeezed himself into the chair behind Perkins’s desk while Mr. Weasley rifled through the sheaf of parchment Kingsley Shacklebolt had given him.')
Mr. Weasley thinks Sirius will find something amusing. (Excerpt: '“Yes, he’s right, I’m sure Sirius will find that very amusing — oh dear...')
Harry sat behind Perkins's desk. (Excerpt: 'Have a seat, Harry, doesn’t look as if Perkins is in yet.')
